short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,el,en,en_AU,en_GB,e: Udemy Plus adds new features on top of your favorite Udemy.
short.de: Udemy Plus fügt Ihrem Lieblings-Udemy neue Funktionen hinzu.
short.es: Udemy Plus agrega nuevas funciones a tu Udemy favorito.
short.fr: Udemy Plus ajoute de nouvelles fonctionnalités en plus de votre Udemy préféré.
short.pt_PT: O Udemy Plus adiciona novos recursos além do seu Udemy favorito.
short.ru: Udemy Plus добавляет новые функции поверх вашего любимого Udemy.
short.tr: Udemy Plus, en sevdiğiniz Udemy'ye yeni özellikler ekler.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,el,en,en_AU,en_GB,e:
Features:
    - More video rates
    - Mark course section completed/incompleted
    - Picture in Picture 🔥🔥🔥
    - Ctrl + Right/Left arrows - to open next/previous video

See upcoming features:
https://github.com/sagynbek/udemy-plus
